text: She-Devil is a 1989 American black comedy movie directed by Susan Seidelman and is the second adaption of the novel The Life and Loves of a She-Devil by Fay Weldon. It stars Meryl Streep, Roseanne Barr, Ed Begley Jr., Linda Hunt, Sylvia Miles, Rosanna Carter, Mary Louise Wilson and was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Susan Seidelman Category:Movies set in New York City
title: She-Devil
